title-position.description: Title location, can be set to left, center, right
title-position.description_zh: 标题位置，可设置为左、中、右

elevation.description: Elevation level, options true false and level of 0-24
elevation.description_zh: 高程级别，选项 true false，级别为 0-24

safe-area-top.description: Whether to enable top safe area adaptation
safe-area-top.description_zh: 是否启用顶级安全区域适配

slots.name: default
slots.description: Customize the title content to override the title content
slots.description_zh: 自定义标题内容以覆盖标题内容

slots.name: left
slots.description: Insert the content to the left of the app bar
slots.description_zh: 将内容插入应用栏的左侧

slots.name: right
slots.description: Insert the content to the right of the app bar
slots.description_zh: 将内容插入应用栏右侧

slots.name: content
slots.description: Insert the content to the extra content of the app bar
slots.description_zh: 将内容插入到应用栏的额外内容中
